content.en: Ray Tracing for Radio: Researchers are exploring the use of ray tracing techniques and algorithms to predict and analyze radio wave propagation in various scenarios, such as indoor and outdoor environments. These algorithms, such as ray tracing routines, ray-path search algorithms, and hybrid imaging techniques, are being used to accurately assess parameters like power, impulse response, delay spread, and electromagnetic field radiation. By improving the accuracy and computational efficiency of propagation prediction models, these algorithms aim to optimize coverage and enhance the design of modern radio systems.
content.da: Ray Tracing for Radio: Forskere undersøger brugen af ray tracing teknikker og algoritmer til at forudsige og analysere radiobølgeudbredelse i forskellige scenarier, såsom indendørs og udendørs miljøer. Disse algoritmer, såsom ray tracing rutiner, ray-path søgealgoritmer og hybride billedteknikker, bliver brugt til nøjagtigt at vurdere parametre som effekt, impulsrespons, delay spread og elektromagnetisk feltstråling. Ved at forbedre nøjagtigheden og den beregningsmæssige effektivitet af udbredelsesforudsigelsesmodeller, sigter disse algoritmer mod at optimere dækning og forbedre designet af moderne radiosystemer.
